${ModID}:OlexasCloak.NAME: Olexa's Cloak
${ModID}:OlexasCloak.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${ModID}:Hoard !hoard!: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist! .

${ModID}:HuttsGamble.NAME: Hutts' Gamble
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.DESCRIPTION: If you don't receive unblocked attack damage 本回合, 获得 [E] and draw 1 card next turn.
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you don't receive unblocked attack damage 本回合, 获得 [E] [E] and draw 1 card next turn.

${ModID}:Tricky.NAME: Tricky
${ModID}:Tricky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card drawn 本回合.

${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.NAME: Sneakyteak Strike
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Put a *Darkside *Slap on top of your 抽牌堆.
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Put a *Darkside *Slap+ on top of your 抽牌堆.

${ModID}:Wanderbots.NAME: Wanderbots
${ModID}:Wanderbots.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Channel a ${ModID}:Wanderbot.
${ModID}:Wanderbots.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Inscribed. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Channel a ${ModID}:Wanderbot.

${ModID}:Retromation.NAME: Retromation
${ModID}:Retromation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, 获得 a card from a Pack not available in your draft. NL It 获得s 虚无 。

${ModID}:OddOne.NAME: Odd One
${ModID}:OddOne.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Odd: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Even: 抽一张牌.

${ModID}:Frostprime.NAME: Frost Prime
${ModID}:Frostprime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Frost and apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BaalorBash.NAME: Baalorlord's Bash
${ModID}:BaalorBash.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle a *Baalor's *Blueprint into your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:BaalorBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle a *Baalor's *Blueprint into your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:BaalorBlueprint.NAME: Baalor's Blueprint
${ModID}:BaalorBlueprint.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your 弃牌堆 into your 抽牌堆. Put *The *Cozy *Chair on the bottom of it. 消耗 。
